topic.title: Brain R3b00t blog (random brainstorming / ideas / thoughts)
ZeroChat Live - A General Chatroom For Everyone
topic.body:
One of the most common observations I've read all around ZeroNet is that the place feels like a ghost town. To the point that people are losing interest because a de-centralized platform feels de-centralized even in the social aspect if the community isn't bonding over this strength.
That being said, here's a general chatroom we can all come together in.
It's not any more sophisticated than the tutorial it was made from, but it can serve as a beginners tool to get the conversation started. Hopefully it will also prompt better chatrooms that offer various rooms and etc. But for now, it's a start!
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1XdLr61DgYL2RLFzb6aDMxhbzHSP5sbrx
Here's to a better community!

1_12DTQBB4zg19DH3xBvsUEKpfcy7tRwqDBm.body:

Yeaaaaa, was thinking the same thing....

2_1Gtj7AdXhzMFUVVvFm2ZGCbTFdgNwdtuMn.body: We've got enough seeders now that it should stay pretty available to everyone

36_19sggoAZ4hcorrrfWoFWP9rwfpVsL29cnZ.body: I really hope they bring the opera developer VPN feature into this (sexy) version of the browser!

However, > [w1nst0nsreboot](#comment_3_1Gtj7AdXhzMFUVVvFm2ZGCbTFdgNwdtuMn): I really hope they bring the opera developer VPN feature into this (sexy) version of the browser!

I doubt they will actually considering this is just a concept browser that's lacking even basic functions like ad-blockers and add-on extensions
